Projects

Website : VocFilm

This website allows users to easily search, review, and access information about their favorite films. Built with Node.js and Express, it offers a seamless experience to explore movies, read reviews, and find detailed information on both new releases and classic favorites.

Website : Pokedex

This web application displays a list of Pokémon using data fetched from the PokeAPI. It is built with Express.js, React.js, and Node.js to provide a dynamic and interactive user experience, allowing users to explore various Pokémon details in an organized and efficient way.

Website :
Voca Task Manager

A web application built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React.js, Node.js) designed to help users efficiently manage and organize their tasks. It allows users to easily add, edit, and track tasks, providing a simple and organized interface for staying on top of their work.

Website :
E-Commerce Thrifting (Reloved)

A web platform built with the MERN stack for buying and selling secondhand clothing. As a front-end developer, the focus is on creating an intuitive, user-friendly interface for browsing and purchasing thrifted items. The platform allows users to easily explore product listings, view product details, and manage their shopping experience in a seamless way.

Design :
Feed Instagram

This Instagram feed is designed to showcase the work and professional photography services of Sore Creative, featuring special moments captured through the lens, highlighting the creativity and expertise behind each photograph.

Design : Event Poster

These poster designs are created to clearly convey important information about various events organized by Taman Baca Pelosok Bumi Karawang. Each poster captures the essence of the event, effectively communicating the key details and creating a visually appealing invitation to engage the audience.

Design : Product Promotion Poster

This product promotion poster is designed as an attractive promotional tool to visually and informatively introduce the product, highlighting its features and benefits to capture the audience’s attention and drive interest.
